author: chfast
content: The `DEEPPOP` only in Cancun if ever (to my understanding).

author: chfast
content: Is it good enough? This can be re-discussed if some new arguments are available.

author: chfast
content: This is automatic stack clearing feature and we have to remove it from the spec. The final 5450 should verify that at `RETF` point there is exactly the number of stack items as specified.
